titleStmt.title: A mirrour for Christian states: or, A table of politick vertues considerable amongst Christians Divided, into three bookes. Reviewed, and augmented, by E. Molinier, of Tolose priest, and Doctor of Divinitie. And by him dedicated, ro [sic] the most illustrious lord, the Lord Cardinall of Valette, Archbishop of Tolose. Translated into English, by VVilliam Tyrvvhit, Sen. Esquire.
Politiques chrestiennes. English
titleStmt.author: Molinier, Étienne, d. 1650.
Tyrwhit, William.

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Molinier, Étienne. Les politiques chrestiennes.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
